titles.title: To establish the permanent Joint Committee for Review of Administrative Rules to review rules of Federal agencies and to amend chapter 8 of title 5 of the United States Code.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

bill.summary: 2/8/2000--Introduced. Establishes the Joint Committee for Review of Administrative Rules to review rules of Federal agencies.Amends Federal law with respect to congressional review of agency rulemaking to conform with this Act.
